description.p: You are skilled in the creation and use of bombs and explosive decives. You gain the following benefits.

ul.li: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You gain proficiency with bomb-creation, and using bombs as weapons.
You can add your Dexterity modifier to attack rolls made with bombs.

sheet.description: You have proficiency in creating bombs, and using them as weapons. You can add your Dexterity modifier to attack rolls made with bombs.
